text:
When rendering the Reader's View (Live) the page-envelope transformation is
applied, but doesn't change the output at all. It just slows down the rendering
of the Reader's View a lot.

Solution:
Add a <map:match pattern="authoring/**.html"/> around the <map:transform/> for
the page-envelope.

Consequence:
Speedup by the factor 2 and more. On my P4 2,8 GHz / 1 GB RAM rendering a page
of the default publication took ~200ms. With the patch applied it was reduced to
~90ms.
creator: suriver@gmail.com
